item.title: Object Tracking
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: Paper: SiamRPN++ propose a new model architecture to perform layer-wise and depth-wise aggregations, which not only further improves the accuracy but also reduces the model size. provide a deep analysis of Siamese trackers and prove that when using deep networks the decrease in accuracy comes from the destroy of the strict translation invariance. present a simple yet effective sampling strategy to break the spatial invariance restriction which successfully trains Siamese
